title: Linear Regression Calculator
name: LGF_RegressionLine
description:
## Short description ##

The simplest case of a regression is the regression line. This means that the assumed 
relationship between the input and output signal is a linear straight line.
Figure: Regression line

## Functional description ##

The block calculates the regression line with the following line equation:
𝑓(𝑥) = 𝑚 ⋅ 𝑥 + 𝑡
𝑚: Gradient of straight line
𝑡: Intersection with y-axis
𝑁: number of array elements

output.name: intercept
output.description: The intersection with the Y axis

output.name: error
output.description: FALSE: No error TRUE: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

in/out.name: values
in/out.description: The data points are transferred with their X- and Y-values.

return_value.description: Void - Function has no return value

user_defined_types.name: LGF_typeRegressionLine
user_defined_types.description: UDT for transferring datapoints to LGF_RegressionLine
